form.subject: =$% optimized to fiBINT_EQ
form.description:
A call to = from an abstract type gets inlined at -q2 to fiBINT_EQ ( in other instances it gets inlined to (FiPtr) equality )
We found (by grepping C code) 94 instances of this bug in libalgebra! No workaround except compiling the whole library at -q1
